articles.title: This is how the Argentine journalist voted in the Golden Ball plebiscite. Robert Lewandowski’s fans will be pissed
articles.description: Quique Wolff, a journalist from Argentina, revealed how he voted in the “Golden Ball” poll. Leo Messi gave the most points, but he completely missed Robert Lewandowski. Fans are eagerly awaiting the publication of how individual journalists voted in the “Golden Ball” plebiscite. The editors of “France Football” are to present a complete list tomorrow. …
articles.content:
Quique Wolff, a journalist from Argentina, revealed how he voted in the “Golden Ball” poll. Leo Messi gave the most points, but he completely missed Robert Lewandowski.

articles.title: Men's Junior Hockey World Cup 2021: Argentina end France's dream run to book final berth
articles.description: Former champions Argentina ended France's dream run by registering a hard-fought 3-1 win in penalty shoot-out of the first semifinal at the Kalinga Stadium in Bhubaneswar on Friday.
articles.content:
Former champions Argentina ended France's dream run by registering a hard-fought 3-1 win in penalty shoot-out of the first semifinal at the Kalinga Stadium in Bhubaneswar on Friday.

articles.title: In ‘Azor’, the true meaning of the notorious ‘Swiss bank account’
articles.description: Andreas Fontana’s assured Argentina-set debut feature is out on Mubi.
articles.content: What is said in Azor matters greatly, especially since it is carefully considered before being voiced. What isn’t said is equally important – if not more. After all, this is a land in which a word or two out of place could render you vulnerable to pe... [5883 chars]

articles.title: Rugby-Argentina lock Lavanini handed five-week ban for Healy hit
articles.description: Argentina lock Tomas Lavanini has received a five-week ban for his illegal clean-out of prop Cian Healy during the Pumas' 53-7 defeat to Ireland in Dublin last month.
articles.content: Argentina lock Tomas Lavanini has received a five-week ban for his illegal clean-out of prop Cian Healy during the Pumas' 53-7 defeat to Ireland in Dublin last month. Lavanini picked up the third red card of his international career for his ruck viol... [864 chars]

articles.title: Armando Bó Preps Heroic Story of the Buenos Aires Herald
articles.description: Under Robert Cox, the Buenos Aires Herald was the only newspaper in Argentina to stand up to its murderous 1976-83 dictatorship.
articles.content:
Argentine Academy Award and Golden Globe winner Armanda Bó has set as his next feature a film on the heroic opposition of the Buenos Aires Herald and its editor Robert Cox to Argentina’s heinous 1976-83 military dictatorship.
To make the film, About ... [3145 chars]

articles.title: Argentina exchanges hikes corn planting forecast to 7.3 mln hectares
articles.description: BUENOS AIRES, Dec 2 (Reuters) - Argentine farmers will plant an estimated 7.3 million hectares of corn in the 2021/22 season, the Buenos Aires grains exchange said on Thursday, hiking its forecast from a previous estimate of 7.1 million hectares.The exchange expects Argentina's 2021/22 corn crop harvest to reach a record 55 million tonnes, a forecast it left unchanged.
articles.content:
BUENOS AIRES, Dec 2 (Reuters) - Argentine farmers will plant an estimated 7.3 million hectares of corn in the 2021/22 season, the Buenos Aires grains exchange said on Thursday, hiking its forecast from a previous estimate of 7.1 million hectares.

articles.title: AWS to launch over 30 new Local Zones internationally starting in 2022
articles.description: At its annual re:Invent conference, AWS announced that it will be launching over 30 new AWS Local Zones in major cities around the world. These new AWS Local Zones will be made available starting in 2022 in over 21 countries, including Argentina, Australia, Austria, Belgium, Brazil, Canada, Chile, Colombia, Czech Republic, Denmark, Finland, Germany, Greece, […]
